response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled performance and convenience. Given its exceptional quality, I believe it's worth more than its face value, but I understand everyone has different perspectives on value. To make things straightforward, I'm offering this remarkable product to you for $12,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 12000}
